snippet.title: The Sims 4 Lovestruck: Official Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Get on the Cupid’s Corner dating app, plan dates with fun Sims, and discover what makes Sims swoon in The Sims™ 4 Lovestruck Expansion Pack*, launching July 25 at 10AM PT. Pre-order or buy through September 5 to get the Heartbreak Happens Digital Content**. 

Finding dates for your Sims has never been easier. Open the new dating app and create a profile – you’ll take a selfie to use as a profile pic and choose which of your Sim’s traits you want to highlight. Then, browse through your matches! These can include both Sims in the world and Sims from the Gallery.

Once you’ve matched with a Sim you’d like to spend time with, start planning your date! Choose the location and which activities you’d like to try together. There are a ton of options including classics like dancing and flirting as well as adventurous options like fishing, swimming, or stargazing. You can even invite additional Sims on your date. Friends, potential partners, or even exes (if you like the drama) can all be invited if you want them to be. 

Whether your date is hot or not could come down to Sims Turn-Ons and Turn-Offs. Some of these are physical, like outfit styles or colors, but others come down to interactions and personality. Those you’ll have to discover. Finding a date is easier than ever, but making relationships work? That’s more of a challenge.

If a date is going poorly, Sims may autonomously decide to leave. 

When Sims become romantically involved, you’ll be able to see how happy they are in their relationships by checking their Romance Satisfaction. Sims can have different levels of satisfaction; what works for one Sim might not work for their partner!

Finding a partner isn't the end of your love story! Relationships will have dynamics, which can be established through gameplay or set in CAS. Will your Sims maintain Wholesome, loving, relationships or happy Steamy relationships? If partners aren't kind things could get Strained. Sims can even have Unpredictable relationships where they switch gears on a dime! 

Explore the fun, flirty side of dating and experience deeper romances in Lovestruck!

Available July 25 at 10 a.m. PT on Origin PC/Mac, Steam, Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation®4, and PlayStation®5. Pre-order now: https://www.ea.com/games/the-sims/the-sims-4/store/addons/the-sims-4-lovestruck-expansion-pack

*Requires The Sims 4 & all game updates. For PC, see minimum system requirements for the pack.

**Conditions and restrictions apply. See https://www.ea.com/games/the-sims/the-sims-4/store/addons/the-sims-4-lovestruck-expansion-pack for details.
